value:
This place is...in a whole different
world than mine? Fine by me, I
guess, if maybe Alm is near.

I'm not really one for fighting, but
Alm joined the Deliverance...
so I did too!

You on patrol? Thanks for watching
out for us! Pass a note to Alm, if
you happen by him?$k$pNothing much... Just a little
"hi" from me!

The Askran Kingdom is so pretty!
I should visit all the nicest spots.
I bet you can guess...with who.

I'm sewing up a good-luck charm.
Alm's always been good luck for me,
so I think of him with every stitch.

Oh, hello there! Are you
$Nu?$k$pGuess who sent me? It was
$Nf!

For Alm and the others,
I have to get even better!

Hey, what do you think?
Not bad, right?
Aw...but I tried so hard.

You did that for me? One step
closer to really helping!

I'm Faye. Glad to help. I've trained
a bit with the Deliverance, you know,
for Alm and all my friends.

Oh! Well, it's you, isn't it,
$Nu.$k$pMy eyes light up every time I turn a
corner around here, hoping that
I'll see you-know-who.$k$pAnd, you know? You're not Alm,
but you don't have to be.
At least, not anymore.$k$pFunny how people can be so
stuck on someone...that they
don't see what's right there.$k$pI know you'd think I'm the last
one to ever say something
like that. But it's true.$k$pI have proof. See? I'm working on
a good-luck charm for you. Thought
of you with every stitch.$k$pDoes it look good? Do you like it?
I hope so. You mean a lot to me,
so I really want it to be great!
ええいっ
Gotcha!
っあっ…
Ahhhhh!
No more!
I've had it!
Wrong move.
For Alm!
Alm...
Heehee...
Now, now—what do you want?
Oh, you! Trying to get my attention?
Oh, Alm... Can't you see how much I love you?
I'd love to show you our village someday.
What do I like? Sewing, flowers, and...sewing flowers. How about you?
I wonder what Alm is thinking about right now...
I'm really fond of Alm, as you know by now. But I've come to care for you too!
OK.
All right.
Try my best.
